metadata.title: CVE-2021-46914 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ixgbe:fix unbalanced device enable/disable in suspend/resume pci_disable_device()called in __ixgbe_shutdown() decreases dev->enable_cnt by 1.pci_enable_device_mem() which increases dev->enable_cnt by 1, was removedfrom ixgbe_resume() in commit 6f82b2558735 ("ixgbe: use generic powermanagement"). This caused unbalanced increase/decrease. So addpci_enable_device_mem() back. Fix the following call trace. ixgbe0000:17:00.1: disabling already-disabled device Call Trace:__ixgbe_shutdown+0x10a/0x1e0 [ixgbe] ixgbe_suspend+0x32/0x70 [ixgbe]pci_pm_suspend+0x87/0x160 ? pci_pm_freeze+0xd0/0xd0dpm_run_callback+0x42/0x170 __device_suspend+0x114/0x460async_suspend+0x1f/0xa0 async_run_entry_fn+0x3c/0xf0process_one_work+0x1dd/0x410 worker_thread+0x34/0x3f0 ?cancel_delayed_work+0x90/0x90 kthread+0x14c/0x170 ? kthread_park+0x90/0x90ret_from_fork+0x1f/0x30

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46914` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required
